column6:
All hail Apocalypse! Last issue saw Sinister squirm from the grave-and now the evolutionary emperor known as Apocalypse has arrived! Superstarr artist Salvador Larroca continues his run here - as the threat to the X-Men kicks into overdrive!,2008,2
Rated T+...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | writer:Robert Kirkman | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca
